title: Update Campaign Budget
description: A campaign is performing better than expected, and the client has approved an additional budget. The manager needs to update the daily budget in the ad platform.

tasks.description: Identify the correct campaign in the advertising platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the 'Q3 Lead Gen' campaign.

tasks.description: Increase the campaign's daily budget from $100 to $150.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the budget setting.

tasks.description: Verify that the change has been saved and is active.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the new budget is reflected in the campaign settings.
